item.title: Closing an Interface, and the title SendQuest?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Try sendQuests 838 - 842, If you notice, there’s a skip in there from the show interface and the first sendQuest text.

eg.

sendQuest("First, get 2147M", 843);//Line 1

-----Stuff -----

showInterface(837);

Read full topic

item.title: Closing an Interface, and the title SendQuest?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Alright, here is my current interface I am trying to make.

I have it all working besides the Title(which as you can see is -2), and the Close Window.

-How do I make it so the close window works?

-Does anyone know the sendQuest ID for the title of this book interface?

Here is my code I am using.

public void ringhelp() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 10162);//Close Text sendQuest("First, get 2147M", 843);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 844);//Line 2 sendQuest("Then type ::buyring", 845);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 846);//Line 4 sendQuest("You will have 1 payment.", 847);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 848);//Line 6 sendQuest("Get another 2147M", 849);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 850);//Line 8 sendQuest("Do ::buyring again", 851);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 852);//Line 10 sendQuest("You will recieve a ROW.", 853);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 854);//Line 12 sendQuest("Have fun.", 855); sendQuest("", 3039); sendQuest("ASk Questions if you need.", 856); sendQuest("", 857); sendQuest("", 858); sendQuest("", 859); sendQuest("", 860); sendQuest("", 861); sendQuest("", 862); sendQuest("", 863); sendQuest("", 864); sendQuest("Page 1", 14165); sendQuest("Of 1", 14166); sendQuest("Ring of Wealth Help", 12742); showInterface(837); flushOutStream(); }

Any help?

Read full topic
item.source: Closing an Interface, and the title SendQuest?
